text: The South and East Wales Air Support Unit is a joint consortium established to provide police aviation for South Wales Police and Gwent Police. It is managed by Inspector Gary Smart and operates a Eurocopter EC135 from MOD St Athan in the Vale of Glamorgan. ==See also== * Police aviation ** Police aviation in the United Kingdom ==References== ==External links== *South Wales Police * (Effectively inactive since 2016) Category:Police aviation units of the United Kingdom
title: South and East Wales Air Support Unit
